mapper.select: select * from easequence where 1=1 and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID}
mapper.delete: delete easequence where 1=1 and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID} and SEQUENCEID= #{SEQUENCEID}
